title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 810.17 - Ownership of operating certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 810.17 - Ownership of operating certificates

State Regulations

All operating certificates shall remain the property of the

Office, are non-transferable, and must be returned to the office upon
revocation or voluntary termination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
810.17

Adopted

New

York State Register September 9, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 36, eff. 9/9/2015

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
